productDescription: Thanks to the compact design, your wallet, phone and other essential items fit perfectly. She has one large compartment and four additional compartments, two with a zip and two without. Nala is made of leather with two beautiful brass buckles on the front.

optionalInfo.material: Our bags are made of naturally tanned leather. No chemicals were used during this process.
optionalInfo.fit:
- B18 x H13 x D7 cm
- push button closure under the copper-colored buckle
- adjustable strap; min 46 cm, max 58 cm
- inside: 1 large compartment and 4 extra compartments; 2 with zipper 2 without
optionalInfo.production: BAGOA is fairly made in India.
